title: Akuyaku Reijō (Kari) No Funtō - Novel Updates
genre: Adult   Fantasy   Mature   Romance   Shoujo   Smut
tags: Adapted to Manga   Arranged Marriage   Broken Engagement   European Ambience   Female Protagonist   Nobles   R-18   Reincarnated in a Game World   Reincarnation   Villainess Noble Girls
author: Ruka Kimura   木村るか
description:
Marquess Rebecca Howard remembered her previous life on the day before the graduation ceremony of the Royal Remus Academy.

Apparently, this is an otome game (supposedly in a magical world) where the heroine is Baroness Charlotte Silva, a candidate for the saint, and Rebecca is a villainess who stands in her way.

When Rebecca realizes she’s been reincarnated into another world, she takes advantage of the condemnation event and manages to break off her engagement to His Highness Prince Garrett.

Her goal is to return to her domain and live a comfortable single life, because she still loves her husband from her previous life… but things take an unexpected turn!　

There are some events that are typical of an otome game, but the outcome takes a turn for the worse, so please be careful if you are expecting a classic story.>
